name: Tags Manager
author: Patrick Matusz

sections.description:
Development closed! Use Plugin Simple Tags instead of this one! You can still use this Plugin as is if you like it!

With WordPress 2.3 tags are included in WordPress. At moment there are almost no functionalities to support these tags in WordPress. This plugin changes this behaviour and adds a page under Management>Tags. Here you can manage your tags!

Deutsche Anleitung!

Changes

Version 0.4 (Closing version)

  • There’s no development anymore. Look at Simple Tags Plugin – it is better!

Version 0.3

  • Shows tags of posts with the possibility to edit, remove tags and add new tags!

Version 0.2

  • Didn’t rename slug when renaming tag!

Version 0.1

  • Convert tag names to lowercase
  • Merge tags
  • Rename tags
  • Delete tags
  • Add and remove posts to tags
  • Show not tagged posts
sections.installation:
• Download the Plugin ZIP File
  • Upload the Folder tags-manager to your wordpress plugin folder
  • Activate the plugin

For Updates:

  • Deactivate the plugin!
  • Continue with the installation steps!
